examples.example: 祝你此次出行一路平安，开心顺利。

translate.english: Wish you a safe journey and a happy and smooth trip this time.

examples.example: 朋友即将远行，我衷心地祝福他一路平安。

translate.english: A friend is about to go on a long journey, and I sincerely wish him a safe journey.

examples.example: 每次家人出门，我都会说一路平安，期待他们平安归来。

translate.english: Every time my family goes out, I will say "bon voyage" and look forward to their safe return.
